tool_description: API to every E-commerce platform. Connect your business with 40+ ecommerce systems through Ecart API. Integrations inlcude Wix, Shopify, Amazon, Mercado Libre, Unicommerce, SAP Commerce and more. https://docs.ecartapi.com
title: ECart

api_list.name: Get all customers
api_list.description: Get a list of all the customers of a store.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecart.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/customers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecart.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Webhook
api_list.description: Add a new Webhook to the store. The Webhook can be triggered depending on the resource and action selected.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecart.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/webhooks"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecart.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
